price: امروز من آنان را از آن رو كه شكیبایى كردند پاداش مى‌دهم. آرى، ایشانند كه رستگارانند».
arabic: إِنِّي جَزَيۡتُهُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innī jazaytuhumu al-yawma bimā ṣabarū annahum humu al-fāizūna
